spiritsExplanation:
The primary spirit of this workout is 'Soothing & Restorative', scoring 0.9. The title, description, and tags emphasize 'gentle', 'guided breathing', and 'relaxation', pointing to a low-intensity session focused on recovery and stress reduction. The description supports this by highlighting the benefits of guided breathing and relaxation, relating to stress relief. Comments reflect participants' appreciation for a 'smooth workout' and its effectiveness in starting the day with relaxation, aligning well with the soothing aspect.

The secondary spirit is 'Flow & Rhythm', given a score of 0.6, as the emphasis on 'smooth workout' with 'lovely guided breath work' suggests coordinated movements with a focus on flow, typical of Pilates. References to 'smooth workout' and 'full body pilates combo' indicate a structured flow integral to Pilates routines.

Other spirits like 'High-Energy & Intense' or 'Sport & Agility' are not suggested by the metadata, as the nature of the workout described is gentle and non-intensive. Similarly, 'Outdoor & Adventure' is excluded due to the home-based setting indicated in the metadata.
